ExpenseTracker

Interface State

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HasBalance, HasSavingNoBalance, LowBalance, NoSavingNoBalance

    public interface State
    Wallet state
    Author:
    Daniele Palazoo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add_money(double amount)
      Add money to the Wallet (balance)
      void pay_off_debt_with_balance(double amount)
      Reduce Wallet debt using the Wallet balance
      void pay_off_debt_with_savings(double amount)
      Reduce Wallet debt using the Wallet savings
      void spend_money(double amount)
      Spend money from the Wallet
      void transfer_to_savings(double amount)
      Transfer money from the Wallet balance to the Wallet savings

    • Method Detail

      • add_money

        void add_money(double amount)
        throws Invalid_amount_exception
        Add money to the Wallet (balance)
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to be added to the Wallet
        Throws:
        Invalid_amount_exception - This is thrown if the amount is not right (e.g. negative value)

      • spend_money

        void spend_money(double amount)
          throws Invalid_amount_exception
        Spend money from the Wallet
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to take away from the Wallet
        Throws:
        Invalid_amount_exception - This is thrown if the amount is not right (e.g. negative value)

      • transfer_to_savings

        void transfer_to_savings(double amount)
                  throws Insufficient_funds_exception,
                         Invalid_amount_exception
        Transfer money from the Wallet balance to the Wallet savings
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to transfer
        Throws:
        Insufficient_funds_exception - This is thrown if the amount is greater than the Wallet balance
        Invalid_amount_exception - This is thrown if the amount is not right (e.g. negative value)

      • pay_off_debt_with_balance

        void pay_off_debt_with_balance(double amount)
                        throws No_debt_exception,
                               Invalid_amount_exception,
                               Insufficient_funds_exception
        Reduce Wallet debt using the Wallet balance
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to reduce debt by
        Throws:
        No_debt_exception - There is no debt to reduce. Debt=0
        Invalid_amount_exception - The amount is not right (e.g. the amount is greater than the debt)
        Insufficient_funds_exception - The amount is greater than the Wallet balance

      • pay_off_debt_with_savings

        void pay_off_debt_with_savings(double amount)
                        throws No_debt_exception,
                               Invalid_amount_exception,
                               Insufficient_funds_exception
        Reduce Wallet debt using the Wallet savings
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount to reduce debt by
        Throws:
        No_debt_exception - There is no debt to reduce. Debt=0
        Invalid_amount_exception - The amount is not right (e.g. the amount is greater than the debt)
        Insufficient_funds_exception - The amount is greater than the Wallet savings
